import React, { useState } from 'react'; import {BsPlusCircle} from 'react-icons/bs' const Schedule = ()=>{ const [slots,setslots] = useState([]) const [days,setdays] = useState([]) const addschedule=()=>{ console.log('clicked') } const daybtn = (day)=>{ var ele = document.getElementsByClassName(day) ele[0].classList.remove('btn-light') ele[0].classList.add('btn-info') var arr = days; arr.push(day); setdays(arr); } return ( <>
Add Work Time
Days Active


{/* enter all the slots here */}
{ slots.map((item)=>{ return(

{item}

) }) }


Add Slot

Schedules

{/* map array of schedules here */}

Add your work timings
) } export default Schedule;
